column.name: Query
column.value: " INSERT INTO "+context.audit_table_restart+"( OBJECT_NAME, BUSINESS_DATE, RECORD_COUNT, START_TIME, END_TIME, SOURCE_SYSTEM, ORGANIZATION_UNIT, QUERY_DETAILS ) VALUES( '"+context.object_name+"', '"+context.business_date+"', '"+String.valueOf(context.source_count)+"', '"+context.start_time+"', '"+context.end_time+"', '"+context.source_system+"', '"+context.organization_unit+"', '"+StringHandling.CHANGE(((String)globalMap.get("tDBInput_3_QUERY")), "'", "\\\\'")+"') "
